website_summaries.verdict: Convenient and pre-measured with no dyes for sensitive skin.
pros: Pods dissolve completely – even in cold water cycles
Less expensive than other pod alternatives
No waste on measuring liquid detergent
cons: This version of All comes in a laundry pod, which can be extremely dangerous if swallowed

website_summaries.verdict: This pod's 2-pack (enough for 134 loads) is a reliable way to clean clothes without triggering any allergic reactions for those with sensitive skin.
pros: Ideal for those with sensitive skin, as these pods are free of fragrance and dyes
Since these pods are made for sensitivity, they’re safe to use on most baby and children’s clothes
Works well for everyday laundry in sanitizing clothing
cons: Is not the best for getting out deep stains

customer_reviews.title: First time I've ever had an allergic reaction to detergent :(
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this detergent a week ago to see if it would help clear up some body acne I'd been dealing with. Instead, after only a few days of sleeping on sheets and wearing clothes washed with this detergent, my entire body and face ended up spotted with painful red welts and bumps. I've never had an allergic reaction to a detergent before, and it's it's disappointing that the first time I try something specifically designed to be gentle, I end up missing work, unable to sleep, and taking medicine to try and stop my very first severe allergic reaction to anything on this planet.
customer_reviews.author: Arcadia

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and description said free & clear of perfumes and dyes. My skin is very sensitive and I usually buy this kind of detergent in the liquid form. Unfortunately after buying this I noticed I was breaking out into hives all over my body. I eliminated any other new products and lotions to get down to it and this soap is the only common denominator. I will NOT be purchasing this ever again. I dont know if its the chemicals used in the plastic Pacs themselves, or a different detergent formula because the color is almost orange which is strange too. Needless to say I am quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leah H

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! These pods damage clothes
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pods, just absolutely terrible. They do not dissolve completely, then they get stocked to your clothes and the clothes come out like they've been with slime of silky potty.... just awful. I tried them with different temperatures, because I tent to wash my clothes with cold water, but it didn’t matter the water temperature, cold, warm, hot.... some clothes would always come out with a piece of pod stock to it. I cannot use this product. I have not had any issues with my washer with any other detergents or pods and my washer is only 1 year old I have a GE® 4.9 DOE cu. ft. Capacity Front Load ENERGY STAR® Washer with Steam GFW480SPK0DG
customer_reviews.author: A.Vel

customer_reviews.title: Cleans line cook uniforms perfectly well
customer_reviews.text: This a great deal for great detergent, here is why: - my other half is a line cook but also has super sensitive skin. This detergent washes his clothes perfectly well on hot, and they also manage to get rid of the greasy kitchen smell even though they don’t have a fragrance. - 2 little pacs for a full load are more than enough. - great for all types of sensitive skin, even tiny babies. We wash all of our clothes with them and haven’t had any issues. - much cheaper than Dreft for babies and just as good. - great value for money
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Just awful! They don’t dissolve!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a couple of months now. THEY DON’T DISSOLVE!!! I am finding them stuck to clothes. (My husband had one that dried hard on his sweatshirt. Had to ice it and scrap it off. I would have been furious it it had happened to a good piece of clothing). Today I found many that were stuck behind the gasket of my front loader. Just awful!! I have been buying All free & clear for a very long time. I still like the detergent, just will never buy the pods again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - be careful
customer_reviews.text: Strongly advise comparing this product with the genuine one in store. Also advise researching the distributor name on the reverse, bought out 4 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Casing doesn't dissolve, ends up in gasket of my front loader
customer_reviews.text: Every time I used one, it would end up in the gasket of my front loader, a big gooey mess I had to clean out with paper towels, and then I had to wash the clothes again to get the goo out. I've used other pods (Tide) that worked great, but these were terrible (and I did follow the instructions, and my machine is a brand new Samsung). Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JKL

customer_reviews.title: Kid Friendly Useable
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand of laundry soap as it is the only brand my family can all agree on to use. There is no smell with this brand so that is a plus. I use the liquid version for everything, however I have my children doing their own laundry and so to avoid the hassle of spills, I purchased these pacs so that they can do their laundry with ease! They simply toss in 1 to 2 pacs depending on their load size and walah! DONE
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Solid laundry pods at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these detergent pods for several years. They do not have an artificial scent which I appreciate. If you enjoy adding essential oils or other mild scent to your laundry this pod will allow them the chance to shine through. It seems to be an effective cleaner. From time to time, I find that a pod will become stuck to the fabric and will not fully dissolve but this is rare. Obviously since they are a pod they are very easy to use and not messy.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Did not cause anyeczem
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Tired of buying liquid bottles that promise 60 loads and only last maybe 40. The pre-measured pads guarantee how many washes I am going to get. My son has terrible eczema and allergic dermatitis reactions to detergents, so always worked about using anything other than our proven safe liquid detergent, but used these while on vacation with no allergic reaction, so gave them a try. They are super convenient, so if reasonably priced I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different strokes for different folks
customer_reviews.text: My niece suggested this to me to use for our newborns clothes. She uses it because she has super sensitive skin and she says it's the only thing she can use that doesn't irritate her skin. Gave it a shot. Clothes stunk after using... Like... Worse than when they went in.. (how!? Idk) spots that were on clothes before being washed were still there after being washed... Didn't irritate my son's skin but... Nothing else bothered him either so after a few times of using, I gave them all to my niece. Personally, I hated this product. But, my niece swears by it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mellen

customer_reviews.title: Itching and baby.
customer_reviews.text: Updates, planning on staying with All laundry detergent husband noticed how clean his work clothes are and knowing that our granddaughters clothes and bath items are mixed with our own we know that it's fine. As we get older everything changes even our skin, what you use to be able too do/use is no longer. Started to notice ichy skin although clothes was just washed knew then it was time for a change for us used All before in the past it's just now I get my ALL clothes detergent from Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Charlette A. P. Kealoha

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awful, the soap gets glue to the fabric leaving, it ruins your clothe and it irritates your skin
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Ferrone

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My whole family has allergies you name the allergy and one of us is got it. Needless to say I tried over 30 different laundry detergent everybody was breaking out some would break out above the waist line while others of breaking out below the waist line even my feet started to itch. But with this product nobody in the family has any problems it is truly hypoallergenic for us and if it works for us it might work for you. Because in our house somebody’s always scratching somewhere. If they bitching because they’re itching give this a try. Good luck stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: These do not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: As I have no seen that others reported, these pacs do not dissolve in the wash, instead they end up melting into your clothes when you throw them into the dryer not realizing the pac has not dissolved like the package claims to in all water temperatures. Very disappointed that I now have one full and one almost full container.
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: Bought with S&S. Save money!
customer_reviews.text: The experience came from the case of the dishwasher. I recently bought a case of pods like this for the dishwasher and realized that it actually last me longer than using the liquid. It turned out we are bad at measuring (or we just don't care), when I do laundry, i always pour it to the top of the cap. Now, I only throw in 1 or 2. So this actually gonna save me money! The product quality speaks for itself to me for years since my kid was born. He has ezyma so we have been sticking with "clear" product. And this clear all mighty has been working well for us.
customer_reviews.author: MNH

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal if you like using the ALL sensitive skin pacs. I've been using these for years since I have sensitive skin and don't like my laundry to be scented. Remember to put these in the water first -- if you lay them on top, sometimes the pac skin cannot dissolve enough and you wind up with sticky goo on a piece of clothing. The remedy is to just wash through another cycle. If you remember to put these in the water first and load loosely around them, you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Cleans your clothes well without perfumes- convenient package
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised. Very convenient, as these are bulky and large, it was great to have them delivered to the door as opposed to having to carry them home from the store. The 2 pack will last a long time and the price was very reasonable. The detergent itself works well and does not leave any heavy perfumes or smells on your clothes- which is great if you do have allergies or sensitivities. The "mighty pacs" are easy to use, eliminates the mess of traditional detergent, and is perfectly portioned so you use the right amount- this way you get your full money's worth from each container as opposed to guesswork.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtus

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT dissolve in any temperature.
customer_reviews.text: These are great only in very hot water washes. The package says that it dissolves in any temperature, but they sure don’t. I’ve had to re-wash many loads of clothes due to dried gunk from the pod on them.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoChik29

customer_reviews.title: Not great for front loaders
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not score these higher is because we've noticed a few times that we have some stains on some clothes and we've figured it out finally that it's whatever item was touching the pack when it pops- gets a burst of liquid that stains it. ;( This would be a good item if we could turn our water on first and let it pop instead of having to close the lid on the whole wash.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mendes Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed not the same product
customer_reviews.text: I've got MCS, so free and clear products are important to me. This detergent works fine, but is *just* detergent. I *thought* I was buying the same product I've always gotten before, which includes additives. Didn't return it because I was in desperate need to laundry soap that day. Compared to the All F&C pacs with additives, this is an inferior product. Leaves behind many small stains that the others removed. Still, if you prefer to add your own laundry solutions, it's a solid product that won't drive those with sensitive skin insane.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne Burton

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for us anymore
customer_reviews.text: I used these for about a year and then my husband started to break out from it. Im not sure if they changed their formula or what but it's not working with his sensitive skin anymore. It was never the best at getting the clothes clean anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I have been using it for years. One thing I do not like is that I am using more than necessary because the pods are stuck together. For example, I just used five pods in a small load because five of them were stuck together and when I try to gently pull them apart the pods bursts. At this rate, I will need another shipment by the end of the month.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fine for semi clean clothes
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend these for clothes that are not very dirty. Being a female that works in an office setting, these are fine for my dress clothes. However I used these on my husbands gym clothes and when I was folding the laundry I actually got confused as to whether I actually washed the basket or not because the clothes still smelled. I also used these on a load of towels from the pool and the towels still smelled like sunblock after drying. So they’re fine for washing semi clean clothes, I won’t use them for dirty or smelly jobs though.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkFirst

customer_reviews.title: Best value for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Best unscented product out there. Cleans clothes well. It is a great price value on Amazon compared to other retailers, particularly with Subscribe & Save. Been using this for years and won’t stop. One call out, however, is I use this with the Bounce Free dryer sheets. You need a fabric softener with this product otherwise it will be a bit stiff and susceptible to static cling.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Updating review - failure of the packaging to dissolve has me fed up.
customer_reviews.text: Detergent itself is great - I've used the free and clear product for years. Was a big fan of these 'mighty pacs' for a while, but have noticed a failure to dissolve issue more and more often. This leaves a mess on some article of clothes that, especially if it goes through the dryer as most of my things do, becomes like a glob of glue in the fabric. Unless there is compelling evidence that a change has been made to fix this I advise use at own risk - Seems I'm not alone in this problem and it is not constant. I suspect some sort of variability in the manufacturing process or other factor coming int play.
customer_reviews.author: Erik --

customer_reviews.title: Rash-Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids is prone to hives when we use scented detergent, so we've been using unscented detergent pacs for years. We alternate between brands, often purchasing the one that's the best price per load of laundry at the time. I don't necessarily have a preference for All vs. Tide vs. Amazon's brand. These and Amazon's brand tend to have the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: evelonies

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Clean Well
customer_reviews.text: These pods do not smell chemically or give my son any skin issues. I only gave 3 stars, though, because they really don’t clean well. We switched to a different name brand that offers a less chemically version - which works amazingly well. These are okay for non-dirty laundry (like never worn stuff that you want to clean before using). Otherwise, a waste of a wash cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Delgaudio

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but the smell is kind of funky
customer_reviews.text: This does a good job of keeping clothes clean. You ABSOLUTELY MUST put the pod in before your laundry ad make sure not to over fill the machine- otherwise it won't be able to fully rinse out and you'll be left with dry crusty detergent on your dried clothes. The product in the container smells kind of funky but it doesn't make your clothes smell and it doesn't bother my sensitive skin whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Navon

customer_reviews.title: Gnarly little suckers!
customer_reviews.text: I've used All Free and Clear for many years. My son has really sensitive skin. I figured I'd try these little suckers so it'd easier for him while away at school. Pop a pac into the basket instead of a whole bottle of detergent. Been using them at home, too, and I have to say, I'm impressed. I only use cold water, they always dissolve, and everything comes out clean. I never thought I'd like something like this, but they're cool.
customer_reviews.author: Wysper

customer_reviews.title: Do not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. Followed the directions and put it in the wash drum first, yet they do it fully dissolve. They often leave a sticky residue on the clothes, the leftover of the pouch. It’s gross! And then you have to wash the load again. I’d like a refund, but it’s been too long since I made my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SnowboarderC

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Repurchase
customer_reviews.text: When using these, we found gooey plastic-y chunks in our wet laundry when switching them over to the dryer, like the pac hadn't fully dissolved. It would dry on the clothes and leave marks if not properly cleaned off before drying. Happened twice when it went unnoticed while switching. I hadn't found them before and haven't found them since stopping use of the Pacs, so can't imagine another cause.
customer_reviews.author: h.hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t dissolve fully
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pods and can usually find great deals on them. But I have just had way too many ruined clothing items due to the fact that they don’t fully dissolve and leaves this sticky clumpy residue behind. I’ve tried doing smaller loads and putting a pod in at the top of the load so water can hit it first. Unfortunately nothing has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Celine W

customer_reviews.title: I think they're fine, just beware of them not dissolving correctly
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is something wrong with my washing machines at college or something wrong with these laundry pods, but I often get clothes out of the wash with big chunks of the detergent pac stuck to the clothes, so that's stuck all over my clothes and then the pac clearly didn't dissolve right either, so the rest of my clothes didn't really get washed either. I now have to check each piece of clothing before putting them in the dryer as to male sure the laundry pac actually dissolved and didn't get stuck to my clothes, because I ruined a shirt in the dryer the first time this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: No mess, easy and clean
customer_reviews.text: I switched to pods from liquid because my building has a community laundry room and the liquid was too messy. Pods are certainly more expensive. The fact is that they are simple, easy, no mess. The box says to use 1-3 based on load size. The pods do seem rather “fragile” and very gel like, but I’ve had no issues. So far all good! I will re buy.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: These pods don’t dissolve and they ruined many of my favorite clothes with a sticky mess! I would never reorder or recommend this product. Purchased early in 2019 for my new home and new washer and didn’t understand what was ruining my clothes! Used one container (came in a 2 pack...what a deal!) before realizing it was the pods...not that I didn’t assume it was the pods, just couldn’t imagine that the purpose of them was to clean your clothes, not destroy them. With throw out the rest...never buy this again. Other than that I liked the detergent...no fragrance, no sensitivity and everything came out clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonians

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My wife is sensitized to many different things (allergic resulting in rashes or each breathing problems) so we use things which have the least number of components that can cause problems and this is one of them. All Free Clear cleans our laundry without leaving a scent behind. Plus the premeasured pacs are convenient.
customer_reviews.author: michael d mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Be aware- not returnable even if damaged/defective
customer_reviews.text: Normally love this detergent. Reordered a 2 pack box. Unfortunately when I opened the inside packaging, it was obvious a pod had ruptured inside the container and leaked everywhere. The pods in that container were all slimy and stuck together. Tried to return but unfortunately this item is not returnable so I will end up throwing out 1/2 my purchase. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M Endicott

customer_reviews.title: Hard, Dried on Garment Ruiner
customer_reviews.text: The packers do NOT always dissolve even when you put in the washer before clothes as directed. So then when you dry clothes you then find out that there is a hard, dried on substance that sticks them together. Bam, garment ruined. I'd like to add we have a brand new, great working front load washer. This is a bad product- returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good, yet need Shout and OxiClean to treat heavy stains.
customer_reviews.text: Our family needs unscented, no-dye laundry detergent. All (liquid and pod packs) does a decent job, yet even using Shout on a blood stain and washing in cold water, the stain did not come out. For heavy stains- blood, ground in dirt such as from working in a garden, grease: we've found that stains have to be sprayed with Shout (or something similar) AND use OxiClean. We always run the laundry through two full rinse cycles to make sure the detergent is removed from the clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Texas31

customer_reviews.title: Use essential oils for scent, go natural!
customer_reviews.text: Best, best, best!!! My daughters and I have Eczema, allergies and one has asthma. Since using this along with dryer balls in the dryer instead of dryer sheets we no more rashes or irritation that always occurred with higher end detergents like Tide or even scented All. I sometimes add a few drops of essential oil to my wash if I feel like having something scented. The scent of this is non existent and that’s a great thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Milliken

customer_reviews.title: The important thing is if you are sensitive to things like detergents this is what you need to get
customer_reviews.text: these are really great they are they work very well and they are great price for the amount that you get they don't make your clothes smell real real fresh but they don't smell bad or anything they do take all the odor out of your clothes it's just a lot of people do prefer to have some kind of a scent with their laundry will you won't have a scent with this but it will smell fresh so that's clean and that's all that matters really great price again
customer_reviews.author: cherylannmcmurray

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are unscented. They dissolve with no problem. My laundry comes out clean every time. I use on pack for smaller loads and 2 for large loads. So satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dallis Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have used ALL Sensitive Skin for years as it's one of the very few products out there (even now!) for extremely sensitive skin and is affordable. The pods make it even easier to use, especially when my son does his laundry and only needs to consider 1 or 2 pods rather than constantly asking how much to pour.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite laundry detergent with no mess
customer_reviews.text: I love All laundry detergent! We have a couple in the family with sensitive skin and I love it that this has no perfumes or other additives that irritate skin or cause rashes. Used the liquid All for years but it tends to drip on the cabinet and ruin the surface so I eventually decided to switch to these. No more mess. The college kids buy the smaller version of these (in a bag not canister) and they're easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ChezKern

customer_reviews.title: Good product - convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good product. I did find that the bubble cover on the liquid detergent did not dissolve completely for 2-3 loads of laundry. Make sure you position the detergent bubble (packet) so that water hits it directly and it dissolves. Overall, I like it - it is convenient and definitely great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: had to order it three times before I got it and the other orders as well
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what the problem was this time but I had to order it three times before I got it and the other things I ordered as well, and then it was left at the wrong house...I have no complaint about the product and the price is great, but if it takes forever to get here.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing this product. I have had eczema for many years and this was the best product for me to purchase for my skin because it helped a lot it is very good for sensitive skin and it cut down on a lot of the itching. I recommend this product for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: patricia wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using All for years. I switched from liquid to this since it was easier for my mom and husband to judge the amount when helping with laundry. I used to be allergic to fragrances and one of my kids has eczema. This works great for us. I just wish the container was child proof
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Looks like old detergent. Not the same as when bought in store!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent! However, I am very disappointed with the Amazon subscription that I have with this product. They are yellow and do not dissolve in the wash. I recently ran out and had to go to the store to pick some up. There was a big difference in the color of the pods. Unfortunately, Will not buy again through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chanalle5

customer_reviews.title: What a great deterent...!
customer_reviews.text: Man who thought laundry soaps could really make a difference... First off... very convenient, no perfumes, clothes come out cleaner. A great detergent... This is now my go-to laundry detergent. I've used many different detergents and never noticed any difference in how clean my clothes were from one detergent to another. That has all changed... I wasn't intentionally looking to see if my clothes were cleaner.. it was blatantly obvious.. and I could in most cases generally care less... But what an obvious difference. I highly recommend this detergent. It is a great value also.. one pod for a regular load.. works super. Very cost effective ...
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, non-irritating... still waiting for the perfect eco laundry solution
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and sensitive skin-safe. Pods of any kind in a cold water wash can ruin your day. Maybe there’s a trick?... extra small load, super load size setting to bust up the pod and not leave a weird film in your clothes. The perfect solution for single dose laundry detergent is still out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rubblemuss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product: good price, convenient, and cleans well. The pods keep me from wasting liquid detergent by improper measuring with the barely visible marks on detergent caps. The only downside I see is if I'm doing a small load, I use bottled liquid detergent because I imagine the pods would have too much detergent for a small load. I wash with cold or cool water and have had no problem with the pod material not dissolving. I'm sticking with these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Greyestfox

customer_reviews.title: COPD Friendly
customer_reviews.text: My mom had COPD and had to find a new replacement for liquid bleach. These pods aren’t as strong as the liquid but they work well enough. I personally prefer liquid bleach but I have been adding oxyclean white with the bleach tabs and the laundry comes out just as clean as before.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done will buy again
customer_reviews.text: There's a good amount of packs. Worth the value. But they honnestly just look like reg detergent in a dissolvable pack. No fancy colors... I guess I don't have to worry about the kids trying to eat them. lol!!!!!!!... That's horrible
customer_reviews.author: Toy

customer_reviews.title: Build up of residue from packets
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy of use, exact amount used and the fact I don’t itch. I don’t like the gunk built up in my washer. Even using the washer cleaning tablets and hot wash with 2 cups of vinegar did not prevent the residue from building up. Check your washer if you use this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a decent price and the unscented products really cut down on the stuffed up noses. After using unscented laundry products our noses are no longer immune to the usual scented ones. Use the unscented for a few months and you'll be shocked by how bad all those scented laundry products smell.
customer_reviews.author: loves a deal

customer_reviews.title: All Free & Clear Mighty Pacs are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love All Free & Clear Mighty Pacs! These little pods have contain concentrated All Free & Clear Laundry Detergent. I love that they are free from dyes and scents. I just pop in one pac or two if the laundry is super filthy into my High Efficiency washing machine. I refrain from using the little draw because the pods do not wash out as they should. Other than that, they do a great job cleaning my clothing. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance
customer_reviews.text: We used the All Mighty packs for tears and although my spouse disliked the scent, they cleaned so well so we continued using them. Now we buy these. Same great convenience and cleaning power with no dyes,or scent. Just nice clean wash.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like ruined clothes
customer_reviews.text: I loyally used All Free and Clear Pods for 5 years, until this past month, when 3 loads I did had melted pods on them after they went through the dryer and ruined about $100 worth of clothes. These were normal loads of laundry, not overstuffed, washed on cold. It was such a disappointment. Time to find new pods.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT DISSOLVE !
customer_reviews.text: We constantly have issues with these. They do not always dissolve. They stick to clothing! Then, if it goes through the dryer stuck to your clothes, they STINK really bad. They usually wash out if we put them through a second time, but they cause problems EVERY wash - warm or cold water.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Do not use this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely easy to use and seems to get my clothes clean. However the pods did not dissolve completely then melted on some of my clothes in the dryer. I was unable to get it out and it has ruined some of the clothes. I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Stonebraker

customer_reviews.title: Different color pacs
customer_reviews.text: So.... Bought this product from this seller and its a total different color. I bought the exact same PRODUCT maybe 3 months ago. You can see the new pacs are very lite.. The packaging is exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: lttleone

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I like All...but will not be getting the little pods again...one container was fine..one has a busted pod somewhere in it ..and everything in it is slimy ..yuck ....likely done in shipping ...so ..if bought in a store ..probably ok....but taking a chance on mail order .....
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: They don't dissolve well!
customer_reviews.text: While I've had no rashes or skin irritations from using this product, I wouldn't order it again because the little pouches don't always dissolve, and I end up with gummy, sticky gobs of whatever they're made of stuck to my otherwise clean laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great value where I can only find small container products for $5 near my house. My kids have sensitive skin, and I prefer to use this one. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Real buyer

customer_reviews.title: new pods are leaky
customer_reviews.text: I've been using All Free and Clear pods for a while and really like the convenience but the last two containers have had leaky pods. I love the product but I don't think I can buy these anymore. When one pod leaks, it seeps over the others, which starts their breakdown process, leading to more leaky pods, etc. I'm not sure why All changed the way they manufacture the pods, but it is definitely a problem now. I may consider coming back to them if they make improvements later.
customer_reviews.author: Jdmded

customer_reviews.title: good for allergies, cheap
customer_reviews.text: I used this because the perfumes they put in most detergents makes my skin itch. This does not. The little pods are super convenient (don't eat them!), no measuring, and this offer was super cheap--I got 2 buckets full for less than it costs me to buy 1 at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: free_labor

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions
customer_reviews.text: Don't like that you have to put pods in before loading clothes can not put in soap dispenser....and believe me the company knows what they are talking about....put in dispenser when I first got the product and clothes did not smell clean or look clean ...then I read the directions duh
customer_reviews.author: queenky

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Far easier than putting in a liquid ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Far easier than putting in a liquid each time. Only thing is on a cold wash for 15 minutes (the quick wash in our machine) I wonder if the pods break up in time to be as effective. However I still recommend. Great product and good price. You also know exactly how many loads you're getting - as opposed to the liquid, which never gets used up and doesn't last as long as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G

customer_reviews.title: Value for you money!
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome at a great price! I buy their Free & Clear fabric softner as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone in the house
customer_reviews.text: I have three pre-teen kids and one infant plus a husband. I have stuff that gets very dirty but I also have the sensitive skin of my baby. At first I was washing all of the baby's stuff separately, which is awesome when you have four kids to deal with. Now I can just throw all of the laundry together and I know the laundry soap is strong enough to clean the clothes but also won't affect my baby's skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E Hughes

customer_reviews.title: List your ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've used the liquid form of ALL for years. Decided to try the pacs and they did fine cleaning the clothes. However, my skin started breaking out after using this just a short time. I went to the website to see if I could compare the ingredients in the pacs to the liquid and it redirects you to another website that only lists numbers and not ingredients. Something is definitely different in the pacs vs the liquid. If you have skin sensitives I'd be cautious if you decided to use these pacs.
customer_reviews.author: MaineFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are what I use all the time for laundry since I have a lot of skin allergies. They work out great! I loved that I was able to get this big two pack delivered from Amazon. The price was also amazing. I generally buy the big box of these from a discount chain, and it is more economical to get them here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Free and clear.
customer_reviews.text: Started with this brand when my daughter because sensitive to other detergents. Have been using for at least ten years. Plan to stick with it because it works. Was buying liquid but started using the pods for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: tnChick & NarcoJoe

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for years
customer_reviews.text: I love these little pods because they are lightweight and so easy to just pop into the washing machine. I've used them for years, and plan to keep on doing so. They seem to clean my clothes as well as powder, and the powder is messy.
customer_reviews.author: zanniegrannie

customer_reviews.title: Good value buying large two pack All
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of the heavy liquid containers of All unscented laundry detergent. These laundry pacs are so easy to use and no mess. I pay a little more per load for all the things it does to make laundry time easier.
customer_reviews.author: TinaM

customer_reviews.title: Busted pods
customer_reviews.text: I normally use this soap and just purchase it at my local store. Thought I would save a trip and get them online. Multiple pod were busted. The whole inside was sticky and soapy as well as the outside of the container. I’ll be buying these in the store next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These do the job, convenience of getting on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my household has a sensitivity to dyes and perfumes causing hives and itching. We have been using these for more than a year and have not had any reactions. I like the container they come in, it keeps them dry and is easy to store. Seems like they do a good job of washing and removing stains and they don't leave any kind of scent on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I've used All Free and Clear since just before my daughter was born. Both her and my husband have eczema and my husband has psoriasis as well. This doesn't irritate either of them at all. And it works just as good as Tide for much less money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Strong Product
customer_reviews.text: This detergent arrived intact, which I was initially worried about. The pacs have a very strong smell in their initial form, which worried me because I have extremely sensitive skin. However, there is no strong smell left on the clothes after they have been washed, and they dissolve completely in the wash, whereas other detergent pods do not always dissolve. Overall, strong product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not dissolve!! Great value but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty bummed as I bought this as a two-pack and I'm not even halfway through the first box and I wish I never bought these. I needed a fragrance- and dye-free detergent as my eczema has been getting aggravated with other detergents, so I was looking through Amazon and these had a good review. Since they were also a brand-name, I decided to buy these. They are...ok. When they dissolve, they are good at cleaning but I've had way too many that do not dissolve and, while they didn't ruin the clothes, they came pretty close. I switched to the liquid version after noticing that these were not dissolving, and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: roxanabanana

customer_reviews.title: Good for top loader machines
customer_reviews.text: No sent and good for sensitive skin. However, we did swap out washing machine from a top loader to a front loader and noticed these don't always dissolve in the front loader well. We occasionally would have laundry soap goop on the clothing that was sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: The BEST and the only one I use! Great cleaning results.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sensitive to most anything else, except for laundry detergent. Sleeping on sheets washed in Tide makes me wake up with hives. I've been using this stuff for years with NO problems at all. The BEST!
customer_reviews.author: St Pete Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I really think this is a great value product. My clothes come out very clean after washing with these pods (I use 2 for nearly every load). I have very sensitive skin and I do not have any reactions to this soap. My three year old does not either. I have used detergents that have left residue on my clothes - these do not. I have these pods on my subscribe and save, which is an awesome convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Better than a sticky soap dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes they don’t dissolve completely. I find that if I put the pod in the back on the bottom and don’t overload with items it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A. Stecklein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all skin types.
customer_reviews.text: We love these! They can be used for all skin types! Our house hold of 6 ranges in ages from newborn to adults with all different skin types and sensitivities this works amazing for our family. And the pods are easy to use. No mess or measuring.
customer_reviews.author: briena

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent for all for our family
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of all detergents ; it is premeasured ( gelpak) that you just plop in the washer and are ready to roll; cleans great and hypoallergenic . Can use for my Grandson with sensitive skin too!
customer_reviews.author: J Gi

customer_reviews.title: All sensative laundry pods
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. I have finally decided to get them the easy way. Amazon sells them for less and you get more. That is a win-win. They are sensitive to your skin and do not leave a sent. I love this product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SandyV

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My go to choice! My family has very sensitive skin so it’s super important to choose carefully. This brand is amazing I love all. It works great on all of our clothes and we never have any problems with it irritating our skin
customer_reviews.author: Renee :)

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dissolve and leaves a sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: Loved these at first, but the latest tub has major issues dissolving leaving a gross sticky mess on my clothes. Luckily rewashing them in a warmer temp saved my clothing. I will not buy these again. I unfortunately had these on a subscription and have 2 unopened tubs that have past there return date. Money down the drain and not to mention the extra cost of rewashing does not make for a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the liquid form.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I'd used the liquid version of this product and been very happy however in the dissolvable packets it's like no bubbles are produced. It's the first time I've ever been disappointed in an ALL product. I've been using ALL for over 20 years and I would not repurchase this. I find even using 3 packets, clothes still come out of the wash retaining odors. I'm switching back to the liquid form.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGal

customer_reviews.title: Great unscented detergent & so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ALL Free & Clear for years and picked up these pacs for a great price. My family does not have particularly sensitive skin but I prefer to use unscented detergent. I have a front load washer and 90% of the time use a cold water wash. I don't have any trouble with pacs not dissolving and normally only use one pac unless I'm doing a huge load or it's a super dirty load. (The true test when my son gets back from scout camp next week - I'll do my best to update my review.) Great product and great value - I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Beckles

customer_reviews.title: I just opened these and the pods are red in color.
customer_reviews.text: The pods where not the clear free and rental pods that normally comes in the all containers. Both of my containers from the same batch had red pods in them. Had I checked these sooner I would have returned them. Very disappointed. This is bad quality control on All or Amazon or Both.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Paul Betson

customer_reviews.title: Great Detergent for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: All Free and Clear was recommended by dermatologist. It is great unscented product that I have used for years. I really like the convenience of the pods so I don’t use too much detergent!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: Free and clear All has been a product we have used for years. It is so gentle we have transitioned to this at 6 months with both our babies from dreft. The option for it to be added to our subscribe & save was a win! win! It comes the same time every month. One less thing to remember.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: Warning, will ruin your clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this product has made me extremely angry. I figured out after losing a second piece of clothing while using this detergent what was going on. The packs were not dissolving in the wash and were sticking to my clothes. After putting them in the dryer they hardened to a super glue like substance completely destroying the clothing. Do not use this product unless you want to risk completely ruining the clothes you wash.
customer_reviews.author: Synapse

customer_reviews.title: Good price great product
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to order these over and over again they last us a long time and are such a good price
customer_reviews.author: Renee Courtier

customer_reviews.title: washes well
customer_reviews.text: i only put 1 star for scent since there is no scent. I have used this detergent for my family's sensitive skin for years and we love it. washes clothes well, no strong scent, and no skin issues. win win!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Riebeling

customer_reviews.title: SAVE your MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. These are supposed to be "free and clear" - the pods are golden yellow NOT clear. I should have returned them when I opened the first tub! When I tried to open the second tub the lid was covered with liquid. One or more of these pods must have leaked. I'm throwing them out. Never will accept a product again like this.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Harrington

product_meta.title: all Mighty Pacs Laundry Detergent, Free Clear for Sensitive Skin, 67 Count, 2 Tubs, 134 Total Loads
product_meta.description: When it comes to laundry care for sensitive skin, all Mighty Pacs Laundry Detergent is the obvious choice. Safe for the whole family, these hypoallergenic single-use Mighty Pacs are gentle on skin. 100% free of perfumes and dyes and unscented, all Free Clear cleans your clothes without leaving irritating residue. Use with all Free Clear fabric softener and dryer sheets for clean and soft clothes with static cling reduction in the dryer. These Mighty Pacs are safe to use in any washing machine. This pack contains two tubs of 67 Mighty Pacs each for a total of 134 loads.
feature_bullets: Safe for the whole family, these hypoallergenic single-use Mighty Pacs are gentle on skin.
100% free of perfumes and dyes and unscented, all Free Clear cleans your clothes without leaving irritating residue.
Use with all Free Clear fabric softener and dryer sheets for clean and soft clothes with static cling reduction in the dryer.
These Mighty Pacs are safe to use in any washing machine.
This pack contains two tubs of 67 Mighty Pacs each for a total of 134 loads

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
